ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor sighed in her sleep, her damaged side aching and annoying her even in her unconscious state, the sheet she was covered with slightly darkening on

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>




* Iron Raptor sighed in her sleep, her damaged side aching and annoying her even in her unconscious state, the sheet she was covered with slightly darkening on her left side from the mech fluid from her injury.
She let out a deep breath as her side suddenly spasmed, causing her to growl softly and open her optics a bit.
Her sight was not to clear at this point from the loss of fluid but her systems were able to focus a bit on an object beside her...Prowl.
Iron Raptor tried to focus her optics further but it was no use, she then closed them for a few moments and then re-opened them...her sight no better then before.
Her side suddenly spasmed again but it was no worse then before, her body even a bit more rested from her, extremely, short nap. She knew that she had to sleep more to regain her strength but she was puzzled as to why Prowl was by her side, but then again it was also obvious...he was worried about her.
Iron Raptor slowly slid her hand up from her side and then pulled the covers away until they left her neck and the flat of her chest without, but covered the remainder. She slowly turned her head towards Prowl as she then rested her hand beside her head, her arm bent at the elbow. She smiled a bit but even that was pained, her look still tired and weak.*

" What are you...doing here?"

* The question was simple and quiet, almost nothing other then a whisper. But even though her optics were tired they still were strong enough to express and show a feeling that was stronger in her then her need for rest, love. They were warm and welcoming, just as she always felt towards Prowl...the bot who had captured her spark where all others had failed.*
